title: Oil Climbs From Four-Month High as Trump Ramps Up Iran Threats
description: Oil rose for a third day after President Donald Trump warned Iran to make a nuclear deal or face military strikes, reviving concerns about potential unrest and disruption in the Middle East.
content: Oil rose for a third day after President Donald Trump warned Iran to make a nuclear deal or face military strikes, reviving concerns about potential unrest and disruption in the Middle East.
